Author: ryannip
Title: [ANN][ICO]🌎Augmate – A Blockchain Agnostic IoT Management Platform🌎
Body: Augmate was founded in 2013 as a B2B enterprise company specializing in managing and provisioning wearable devices. Augmate was both an original Google Glass@Work Partner and recognized as a Gartner Cool Vendor in 2017 - we've been around and successful for quite some time.  Although the original business vision was focused on wearable device management, we understood the need for a human-to-machine management platform for all IoT devices that takes both security and speed into consideration. Augmate’s current vision is to create a single management and provisioning system for IoT environments using our Augmate Connect platform coupled with distributed ledger protocols.

Author: ryannip
Title: [ANN][ICO]🌎Augmate – A Blockchain Agnostic IoT Management Platform🌎
Body: Introducing Augmate: A Blockchain Agnostic IoT Management Platform for Device Management and Data Security  Telegram | Reddit | Twitter | Website | White Paper  MAKE SURE TO CHECK OUT COINLIST TO PARTICIPATE IN THE ICO  [Accredited Investors]  http://i.imgur.com/zFhEgxk.png  IoT Device Management using Distributed Ledger Technology  Augmate Connect will use the best in distributed ledger technology and our own MATE™ crypto token to manage devices with ground-breaking advancements in security and data exchange.  http://i.imgur.com/FUuTzVA.jpg  Augmate empowers Enterprise IT to securely deploy and manage IoT devices  Augmate is the leading device management solution for wearable technology and bringing the power of the distributed ledger to the Internet of Things. With Augmate, IT teams breathe easier knowing devices conform to internal security policies and protect corporate information while providing a seamless user experience for employees.  http://i.imgur.com/pZXz5ta.png  Augmate Connect, IoT and our MATE™ token  We believe that a distributed ledger technology is the future of connected device security and interoperability. Augmate was the first wearable device management platform and we are now the first in IoT device management using distributed ledgers. We are launching the MATE™ token (Machine Access Token Exchange) to create a platform where all can participate in the rise of a global ecosystem of devices and human connectivity, beginning with enterprise but quickly moving to the consumer space.  http://i.imgur.com/Pc2T99o.jpg  IOTA and Augmate - A Beginning  The integration strategy between Augmate and IOTA rests on the fact that they are both platforms that support an IoT ecosystem without themselves being IoT endpoint application software.  Augmate is at the core, an agnostic platform when it comes to device and application integration. As such, we will continue to work on interoperability with all systems, old and new. Included in our R&D Roadmap is EOS and new Ethereum technology that has high interaction speed and low cost for those interactions.

Title: [ANN][ICO]🌎Augmate – A Blockchain Agnostic IoT Management Platform🌎

Author: Germican
Title: [ANN][ICO]🌎Augmate – A Blockchain Agnostic IoT Management Platform🌎
Body: Can you explain a bit more about the team?

Author: ryannip
Title: [ANN][ICO]🌎Augmate – A Blockchain Agnostic IoT Management Platform🌎
Body: Sure - our team features seasoned industry experts including Pete Wassell our CEO - a former IBM executive running multimillion dollar programs, Dana Farbo who has built and sold companies, Eddie Quiroz who has led multiple IT projects from start to finish, Bob Visnov who has deep experience in data infrastructure and has developed blockchain solutions in the past, and many more. We're quite built to succeed.
